alert.note: Alert for Ector; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:11PM CDT until May 12 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Ector County in western Texas... Northwestern Midland County in western Texas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 311 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Odessa, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Odessa, West Odessa, Odessa Schlemeyer Field and Pleasant Farms. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 107 and 122. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
